definition: the number of showings of a movie, play etc/screening/performance
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: Mourinho's win-lose ratio is vastly superior to that of Benitez.
sentences.chinese: 穆里尼奥的胜负场次比率要远远高于贝尼特斯。

sentences.english: TheRockets lead San Antonio by a half-game.
sentences.chinese: 此役之后，火箭队在场次上领先圣安东尼奥半场。

sentences.english: Anita Mui and Connie Mak were guests for different nights.
sentences.chinese: 梅艳芳和麦杰文会在不同的场次出现。

sentences.english: In our losses, it seems like we play listlessly and spiritless .
sentences.chinese: 在那些失败的场次中，我们打得无精打采。

sentences.english: Tickets for those screenings were priced higher than for other showtimes.
sentences.chinese: 这些场次的票价都比平时高。

sentences.english: Due to an injury, the quarterback had to sit out the rest of the season.
sentences.chinese: 因为受伤，该四分卫不参加此球季的其余场次。

sentences.english: Repertoire relates to screening in the text of play I have to help guide.
sentences.chinese: 涉及到武戏场次中的文戏我也来帮忙导。

sentences.english: A: Oh, where can I find the times and location listings?
sentences.chinese: 这样啊，哪里可以找到电影场次表跟各戏院的位置呢？

definition: to be at the scene (sitting for an exam, performing, competing, giving directions etc)/firsthand (experience)/impromptu (remarks etc)
variant of 記錄|记录[ji4 lu4] (but in Taiwan, not for the verb sense "to record")
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
total victory/to excel by far/name of a tank/slam
